page.title: 06Trusley Church - Details
page.content: Vicar shared between the four parishes of Sutton, Church Broughton, Boyleston & Trusley. There are 32 people in parish but few children. {Services -}one every Sunday, 50 mins. Last wedding registered in 1977 " burial " 1983 " baptism " 1981 Three baptisms planned for 1985 Av. congregation about 11 people. Still use{1st Series Hymn Book & Order {of Service. {Activities}Various fund raising events e.g. garden fetes, coffee mornings. Money for upkeep of church, but some sent to charities. In 1985 Ethiopian Famine Relief benefitted. {Collection}Â£180 approx. p.a. goes towards vicar's salary, remainder to the church.
